title: forgotten password and email
body: Is it possible to find out what email you used to make an account?

replies.body: I am trying to use the username recovery but when I put my email in it doesn't receive any email also not in the spam folder. I also tried to swap email from one league account to the same email as mentioned above and never received the verify email.

We have an [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide that will provide steps towards recovering your account.  You can get a hint of what your email might also be through the [account management](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751934-General-Account-Information) page.  Let me know if that helps!
